title: Eigenstates of the Atom-Field Interaction and the Binding of Light in Photonic Crystals
abstract: We solve for the exact atom-field eigenstates of a single atom in a three dimensional spherical cavity, by mapping the problem onto the anisotropic Kondo model. The spectrum has a rich bound state structure in comparison with models where the rotating wave approximation is made. It is shown how to obtain the Jaynes-Cummings model states in the limit of weak coupling. Non-perturbative Lamb shifts and decay rates are computed. The massive Kondo model is introduced to model light localization in the form of photon-atom bound states in photonic crystals.
